analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  hetuduka
translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The reverse order of the law of conditionality, the triplets beginning with the conditions, the text on the conditions in brief🔽With a non-cause as condition, a non-inferior state …🔽With a non-cause as condition, an inferior state …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a medium state …

original: Nahetuṁ nahīnaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu hīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nahetuṁ namajjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetum na hīnam dhammam paccayā hetu hīnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na hetum na majjhimam dhammam paṭicca na hetu majjhimaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a non-cause as condition, a good state …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a great state …

original: Nanahetuṁ namajjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na na hetum na majjhimam dhammam paṭicca na hetu majjhimaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a non-cause as condition, a small state …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a subtle state …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a gross state …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a far state …

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With a non-cause as condition, a near state …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a visible state …🔽With a non-cause as condition, an invisible state …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a state with impingement …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a state without impingement …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a state with a condition as object …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a state without a condition as object …

original: Nahetuṁ napaṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu paṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na paṇītam dhammam paccayā hetu paṇītaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With a non-cause as condition, a state with a result as object …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a state without a result as object …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a state with a cause as object …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a state without a cause as object …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a state with a condition as object …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a state without a condition as object …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a state with a result as object …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a state without a result as object …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a state with a cause as object …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a state without a cause as object …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a state with a condition as object …🔽With a non-cause as condition, a state without a condition as object …
